hero.title: Become a Fan on {website.name}
hero.subtitle: Join the global sports community on {website.name} and cheer for your favorite teams and athletes. Access exclusive content, highlights, and fan experiences in {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}.

becomeFan.title: How to Become a Fan
becomeFan.description: Becoming a fan on {website.name} is simple and free. Follow these steps to connect with your favorite sports, teams, and players, and dive into the action like never before.

form.title: Sign Up as a Fan
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below to join {website.name} and start supporting your favorite teams.

steps.title: Create Your Account
steps.description: Sign up for free with your email and basic details. It takes just a minute to join the {website.name} community.

steps.title: Choose Your Sports
steps.description: Select your favorite sports and teams from our list of 15+ sports. Customize your feed to follow the action you love.

steps.title: Engage and Explore
steps.description: Watch highlights, follow live updates, and connect with other fans. Share your passion and stay in the game.

items.title: Live Game Updates
items.description: Stay in the loop with real-time updates on scores, stats, and key moments from your favorite teams on {website.name}.

items.title: Exclusive Highlights
items.description: Watch curated video highlights of top plays and moments, available only to {website.name} fans, directly on our platform.

items.title: Fan Community
items.description: Join discussions with fans in {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}. Share your thoughts and celebrate victories together.

items.title: Real-Time Engagement
items.description: Get instant updates and interact with live game moments to feel closer to the action.

items.title: Exclusive Content
items.description: Access premium highlights, interviews, and behind-the-scenes content tailored for fans.

items.title: Global Fanbase
items.description: Connect with millions of fans worldwide and share your passion for sports.

items.title: Personalized Experience
items.description: Customize your feed to follow your favorite teams, sports, and players effortlessly.

items.title: Free to Join
items.description: Start as a fan for free and upgrade for premium features like ad-free viewing.

items.title: Multi-Sport Access
items.description: Support any sport, from soccer to volleyball, with tools designed for every fan.
